title: Barry Geel
text:
Barry Geel (born 30 April 1982) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer. He regularly plays as a <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a>.
Career.
Geel started out his career with the in 2002 and had four years in <a href="Potchefstroom">Potchefstroom</a> before switching to the in 2007. He spent another four years with the Peacock Blues, making 76 appearances and scoring 23 tries. He earned his first call up to <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> with the in 2010 and eventually switched provinces to the in 2012.
